input.sentences: the family gathered for jerry 's birthday .
people were coming in and out all day .
we saw a few strangers that we did n't know | but it was fine .
jemma decided to take pictures to pass the time as the grownup partied .
[female] and the dog fell asleep mid party .
output.sentences: Jerry woke up early to get ready for the party.
Most of the extended family were coming over today.
There would also be some people he didn't know but he was eager to meet some new faces.
Jerry and his parents passed the time looking at some old photos of his sister while they waited for their guests to arrive.
Jen arrived mid way through the afternoon and Jerry liked her immediately.
